author: bencomic

right.text: and I said "let's have an orgy!"

left.text: when I was 8 we were at the dinner table talking about what to do for my birthday party

right.text: it turns out that orgies aren't the same thing shown in asterix comics

left.text: and they all looked at me
where they lie around eating roasted boars and having fondue and watching dancing girls

title: ORGIES! ORGIES! WE WANT ORGIES! a true story
